submodules.title: Task Management UI
submodules.description: A clean and minimalistic interface that allows users to view, add, and delete tasks effortlessly. The UI will be responsive, ensuring a seamless experience across devices.

submodules.title: Task Completion Checkbox
submodules.description: An interactive checkbox feature that enables users to mark tasks as done. This visual feedback helps users track their progress and manage their to-do list effectively.

submodules.title: Theme Toggle
submodules.description: An optional feature that allows users to switch between light and dark themes, enhancing user experience based on their preferences and lighting conditions.

submodules.title: Task Filtering
submodules.description: An optional filtering system that allows users to view tasks based on their status: all, active, or completed. This feature helps users focus on specific tasks and manage their workload efficiently.

submodules.title: LocalStorage Management
submodules.description: Implementation of localStorage to save tasks persistently on the user's device. This ensures that tasks remain available even after the browser is closed or refreshed.

submodules.title: Data Structure Design
submodules.description: Designing a structured format for storing task data, including task descriptions, completion status, and timestamps. This structure will facilitate easy retrieval and manipulation of tasks.

submodules.title: Responsive Design
submodules.description: Ensuring that the application is fully responsive, providing an optimal viewing experience on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

submodules.title: User Feedback Mechanism
submodules.description: Incorporating visual cues and notifications to inform users about successful task additions, deletions, and completions, enhancing overall user engagement.

submodules.title: Unit Testing
submodules.description: Conducting unit tests for individual components to ensure they function correctly and meet the specified requirements.

submodules.title: User Acceptance Testing
submodules.description: Gathering feedback from real users to validate the application's usability and functionality, ensuring it meets user expectations.

submodules.title: User Guide
submodules.description: Creating a comprehensive user guide that explains how to use the application, including features like task management, theme toggling, and filtering.

submodules.title: Technical Documentation
submodules.description: Providing detailed technical documentation for developers, outlining the architecture, data structures, and codebase for future reference and maintenance.
